title: Mark Brunell joins the show + Reaction to Jags firing Tom Coughlin
itunes:title: Mark Brunell joins the show + Reaction to Jags firing Tom Coughlin
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks discuss the Jaguars firing Tom Coughlin as Executive VP of Football Operations (0:46). The guys preview the three Saturday games on the Week 16 slate, including Texans-Buccaneers, Bills-Patriots, Rams-49ers, while specifically concentrating mainly on the Bills-Patriots (9:40). Plus, DJ and Bucky highlight the record-tying 12 Baltimore Ravens named to the Pro Bowl (17:19). Former Pro Bowl QB Mark Brunell joins the show to talk about his playing days and the quarterback position (27:27). To close the show, the guys answer fan questions (43:21).

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
